reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: This app is very nice, but you should make \'\'EXO Shake\'\' too.  I think will much exo fans download that\'s app.
reviews.author: Devi Yana

reviews.comment: It goes back to the home screen of the game! Making me UNABLE TO PLAY A SONG!!!\tI could\'ve given this game FIVE TREASURE STARS but I\'m sorry to give only 2 stars. 1 star for the FT boys that I love and another Star for the compatibility of the game in my fone however, right after opening the game and choosing a certain song and play, it goes back to the homepage, where the five boys appear, IT DOESN\'T LET ME PLAY. PLEASE FIX THE BUGS, DEVS!! thanks and hwaiting! :)
